name: Antivirus (Nooh Alavi, Waller3000)
description:
An intense bullet hell game where you control an antivirus program and fix a computer that is corrupted with a nasty virus known as the coronavirus. Uncorrupt files to level up, and avoid contact with the virus at all costs. Your mission is to save your computer by destroying the virus.... forever.

Playable with Keyboard + Mouse or Controller.  

Made in about one week for the Bullet Hell Game Jam #2 (https://itch.io/jam/bullet-hell-game-jam-2). Theme: Corruption.

Developed and programmed by Nooh Alavi, art and animations by Walter Barlow (Waller3000), music by Leftlane, sounds by Yahya Patel.
